fields.description: Most of the chassis for security in YARN is set up and is working. There are known bugs and security holes though. This JIRA is an umbrella ticket for tracking those.

Umbrella ticket being fixed across versions.

Originally filed this before YARN was its own sub-project.

Resolving this very old umbrella JIRA, YARN-47 was already resolved too.. Security (auth + authz) has largely been nearly complete/stable in YARN and MR since this ticket was opened. And as new requirements come in, we can open new tickets.
 - Will leave the open sub-tasks as they are.
 - Unassigning from me given multiple contributors on the tasks.
 - No fix-version as this was done across releases.
